Gaza humanitarian issues will be a top Blinken priority, White House's Sullivan saysHumanitarian issues in Gaza will be a top priority for U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken on his current trip to the region, White House national security adviser Jake Sullivan said on Sunday. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 14:27:21 GMT HGGKOEMOMVPGJLZ3JXQJOD6R74 https://www.reuters.com/world/gaza-人道主义-issues-will-be-top-blinken-priority-white-houses-sullivan-says-2024-02-04/Reuters世界
Zelenskiy visits front line, army chief's future in questionPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy visited Ukrainian troops on the southeastern front and handed out medals, his office said on Sunday amid intense speculation that his popular army chief could soon be sacked. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 13:12:05 GMT 2EKOJSAEKZPKBI5R6LYHDREQIM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-visits-front-line-amid-speculation-about-fate-top-general-2024-02-04/Reuters世界欧洲
DR Congo youth group says seven activists abducted by suspected security agentsSuspected agents of the National Intelligence Agency (ANR) abducted seven youth activists at a peaceful rally in Democratic Republic of Congo on Saturday, a youth group said. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 12:50:27 GMT GZOEZBKEJRIYJDIGUUGCK7CPV2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/dr-congo-youth-group-says-seven-activists-abducted-by-suspected-security-agents-2024-02-04/Reuters世界非洲
Gaza doctor describes ordeal of detentionA Palestinian doctor says Israeli forces in Gaza detained him when they overran a hospital and subjected him to abuse during 45 days of captivity including sleep deprivation and constant shackling and blindfolding before releasing him last week. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 12:10:24 GMT兰奇57HJNOHFBG2NIK45NF5RA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-doctor-describes-ordeal-detention-2024-02-04/Bassam Masoud, Ibraheemabu Mustafa世界中东
El Salvador President Bukele poised for another landslide as voters head to pollsSalvadorans head to polls on Sunday in elections expected to hand President Nayib Bukele another landslide victory, with many happy to overlook the young leader's authoritarian drift after he crushed gang violence paralyzing life across the country. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 12:03:37 GMT OXDOOR2WGJPKLCNYW7LXZHXJ34 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/el-salvador-president-bukele-poished-another-landslide-voters-head-polls-2024-02-04/Nelson Renteria, Diego Oré世界美洲
Hamas hounds Israeli forces in main Gaza citiesPalestinian gunmen kept up attacks against Israeli forces on Sunday in the Gaza Strip's two main cities, weeks after they were overrun by troops and tanks, in a sign Hamas still maintains some control ahead of any potential truce. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 11:45:45 GMT 3PTXKNJQGZJCREG57MUNR7SJVM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-hounds-israeli-forces-main-gaza-cities-2024-02-04/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud, Dan Williams世界中东
Protesters who climb Britain's war memorials could face jailProtesters who climb Britain's war memorials could face three months in prison and a 1,000 pound ($1,260) fine under government plans to create a new criminal offence after incidents during pro-Palestinian demonstrations. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 11:03:09 GMT GZ3RX6CJPNNU3JQ7HFECVD5LCI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/protesters-who-climb-britains-war-memorials-could-face-jail-2024-02-04/Reuters世界欧洲
Yemen's Houthis vow response after US, British strikesThe Yemen strikes run parallel to an unfolding campaign of retaliation over the killing of three American soldiers in a drone strike by Iran-backed militants in Jordan a week ago. Iran has so far avoided any direct role in the conflict. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 10:56:52 GMT 7Y3ALGRAQVJZJJCV7W7C63ULAE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemens-houthis-vow-response-after-us-british-strikes-2024-02-04/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali, Mohammed Ghobari, Timour Azhari世界中东
Biden courts Nevada voters after narrow 2020 winBiden appears on the ballot along with self-help author Marianne Williamson and lesser-known challengers. Dean Phillips of Minnesota missed the filing deadline and won't appear on the ballot. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 10:04:31 GMT FAPHKZYQCZLB5J3T2MI3PTHKDM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-courts-nevada-voters-after-narrow-2020-win-2024-02-04/Jarrett Renshaw世界美国
Philippines ready to use 'forces' to quell any secession attempt, official saysThe Philippine government is ready to use "authority and forces" against attempts to divide the nation, a security official said Sunday, after former President Rodrigo Duterte threatened to separate some southern islands from the rest of the archipelago. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 05:50:42 GMT QMLC7ZFJOVMM3FT6ZGL2DKMFMI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-ready-use-forces-quell-any-secession-attempt-official-2024-02-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
Namibia's President Hage Geingob, 82, dies after cancer diagnosisNamibia's President Hage Geingob, 82, died in hospital early on Sunday, the presidency said, weeks after he was diagnosed with cancer. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 03:01:15 GMT 525PJVCW2VOXNI36PSQWTNSBOA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/namibias-president-hage-geingob-dies-2024-02-04/Tim Cocks世界非洲
